channel.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
channel.description: yah, need lil help i kno how to code pretty well but im trying to fix how to make and item show up on the ground after u drop it instead of disappearing.. Useing Divine Pk 5.0 source if anyone could just help me a lil it would be appreciated.

item.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

j 3 s u s:

yah, need lil help i kno how to code pretty well but im trying to fix how to make and item show up on the ground after u drop it instead of disappearing… Useing Divine Pk 5.0 source if anyone could just help me a lil it would be appreciated.

dont use divine…
use rscd v25 and XML it till its just like divine then code in some feature with points or what not

item.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
item.dc:creator: @_RSC_Coder ¤RSC[]Coder¤
item.description:
@_RSC_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Keith-Is-Back, post:12, topic:255314”]Wow, all of you are retarded as fuck,

Alright go to your EVENT folder then open the Dropevent

Now you will see like a 1500L or something like that, take the L off and

then at the end you will see a return; somewhere take that off then dropping is enabled,

but once this is enabled there are about 3 dupes players will be able to do, but its not a hard fix.[/quote]
And you are not? Spreading ur botnet saying its rsca bot with sleeper -,-

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?

item.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
item.dc:creator: @Keith-Is-Back Keith-Is-Back
item.description:
@Keith-Is-Back wrote:

Wow, all of you are retarded as fuck,

Alright go to your EVENT folder then open the Dropevent

Now you will see like a 1500L or something like that, take the L off and

then at the end you will see a return; somewhere take that off then dropping is enabled,

but once this is enabled there are about 3 dupes players will be able to do, but its not a hard fix.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?

item.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

lol owned… man if you go to your “dropdef.xml” file you can edit “true to false” or other way around to achieve what you want. After you have done that copy the exact file and put in into a compressor, or simply just use 7zip. Then compress it into a xml.gz. Recompile the server and run it, should be able to drop. Before you edit any file at all make sure you have another copy of it just incase something goes wrong, its what i do.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?

item.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“gawdz666, post:8, topic:255314”]/**
* Registers an item to be removed after 3 minutes
*/
public void registerItem(final Item i) {
if(i.getLoc() == null) {
delayedEventHandler.add(new DelayedEvent(null, 180000) {
public void run() {
ActiveTile tile = getTile(i.getLocation());
if(tile.hasItem(i)) {
unregisterItem(i);
}
running = false;
}
});
}
}[/quote]

I think hes running divine pk, not rscd.

Read full topic

item.source: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?

item.title: How do i make my server items dropped not disappear?
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

/**
 * Registers an item to be removed after 3 minutes
 */
public void registerItem(final Item i) {
  		if(i.getLoc() == null) {
  			delayedEventHandler.add(new DelayedEvent(null, 180000) {
  				public void run() {
  					ActiveTile tile = getTile(i.getLocation());
				if(tile.hasItem(i)) {
					unregisterItem(i);
				}
  					running = false;
  				}
  			});
  		}
}

Read full topic
